name: healthBehavior
title: Health Behavior Assessment (Smoking status, etc)
description: Assessment of health behaviors like smoking status, alcohol use,

feature.name: time
feature.title: Behavior assessment time
feature.description: Time that this behavioral information is taken or valid

feature.name: code
feature.title: Code for the behavior
feature.description: LOINC code indicating the behavior (72166-2 -> smoking, 88031-0 -> other nicotin, 11331-6 -> alcohol, 11343-1 -> illicit drug)

feature.name: frequency
feature.title: Frequency of the behavior
feature.description: SNOMED-CT or LOINC code indicating the behavior frequency
